title: Bill Kilpatrick
text:
William "Bill" J. Kilpatrick (birth unknown – death unknown) was a professional <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer who played in the 1920s and 1930s. He played at representative level for <a href="Other%20Nationalities%20rugby%20league%20team">Other Nationalities</a>, and at club level for <a href="Oldham%20R.L.F.C.">Oldham</a> (<a href="List%20of%20Oldham%20R.L.F.C.%20players">Heritage № 257</a>).
International honours.
Bill Kilpatrick won a cap for <a href="Other%20Nationalities%20rugby%20league%20team">Other Nationalities</a> while at Oldham in 1930.
